column4: This is officially a weird error. i tried "gksu "sh /cdrom/cdromupgrade" on the alternate cd and got this error "SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSegmentation fault (core dumped)"
